src:
Shopee Liga 1: Duel Antarlini PSM Vs Kalteng Putra
06 Nov 2019, 11:34 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Amido Balde didatangkan PSM Makassar dari Persebaya Surabaya dengan harapan tinggi. Sebab, sang pemain berstatus top scorer Piala Indonesia 2018.
Manajemen Juku Eja tak peduli dengan status Balde yang tak lagi terpakai di Persebaya.
Awalnya, penampilan Balde menjanjikan pada laga debutnya dengan mencetak satu dari dua gol PSM ketika menekuk Persela Lamongan 2-1 di Stadion Andi Mattalatta Mattoangin, 1 September lalu. Eks striker Glasgow Rangers ini pun kontan mendapat pujian dari suporter PSM.
Tapi, situasinya ini tak lama dinikmati Balde. Baru tiga partai bersama Juku Eja, Balde terkena cedera hamstring yang membuatnya harus beristirahat. Ketika pulih, penampilan Balde tak langsung seperti dulu. Sorotan dan kritikan suporter pun terus menderanya.
Menghadapi Kalteng Putra pada laga pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 di Stadion Andi Mattalatta, Rabu (6/11/2019), jadi ajang uji kapasitas Balde di hadapan pendukung PSM.
Kalau dimainkan oleh pelatih Darije Kalezic dan tetap gagal memberi kontribusi, pamor Balde kian tenggelam. Tentu hal ini tidak diinginkan Balde. Apalagi, pada pertandingan nanti, ia akan dimanjakan oleh umpan terukur Wiljan Pluim.
Bukan hanya itu, Darije bisa saja memilih opsi langsung menduetkan Balde dengan Ferdinand Sinaga di lini depan untuk memburu gol kemenangan.Bila hal terjadi, jelas Kalteng Putera berada dalam bahaya.
Target mencuri poin di Makassar untuk melepaskan diri dari zona degradasi bakal terkendala. Selain Balde dan Ferdinand yang dibebankan mencetak, masih ada pemain lain yang berpotensi menjebol gawang Kalteng Putera yakni Rizky Pellu dan Marc Klok.
Lantas, siapa saja pemain di setiap lini yang akan memegang peranan penting dalam laga nanti? Berikut ini duel antarlini yang bakal terjadi dalam laga PSM Makassar kontra Kalteng Putra PSM seperti dilansir Bola.com:
text:
Shopee Liga 1: PSM vs Kalteng Putra Interline Line Duel
Nov 6 2019, 11:34 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Amido Balde brought in Makassar PSM from Persebaya Surabaya with high hopes. Because, the player is the 2018 Indonesian Cup scorer top status.
Juku Eja Management does not care about the status of Balde which is no longer used in Persebaya.
Initially, Balde's promising appearance on his debut match by scoring one of PSM's two goals when bending Persela Lamongan 2-1 at the Andi Mattalatta Mattoangin Stadium last September 1. The former Glasgow Rangers striker was immediately praised by supporters of PSM.
But, the situation was not long enjoyed by Balde. Only three parties with Juku Eja, Balde suffered a hamstring injury which made him have to rest. When recovering, Balde's appearance was not straightforward as before. The spotlight and criticism of supporters also continues to suffer.
Facing Kalteng Putra in the 27th Shopee League 1 match at the Andi Mattalatta Stadium on Wednesday (11/06/2019), it will be a Balde capacity test event in front of PSM supporters.
If played by coach Darije Kalezic and still fails to contribute, Balde's prestige will sink. Of course this is not desired Balde. Moreover, in the match later, he will be spoiled by Wiljan Pluim's measured bait.
Not only that, Darije could have chosen the option to directly duet Balde with Ferdinand Sinaga up front to chase the winning goal. When things happen, Kalteng Putera was clearly in danger.
The target of stealing points in Makassar to escape from the relegation zone will be constrained. In addition to Balde and Ferdinand who are charged with scoring, there are still other players who have the potential to break down Central Kalimantan Putera goalkeepers Rizky Pellu and Marc Klok.
So, who are the players in each line who will play an important role in the match later? The following duel between lines that will occur in the PSM Makassar match counter Kalteng Putra PSM as reported by Bola.com:
